review: I found the picture misleading and did not realize it required plugging a power cable into the stick for it to work. For most people with a flat screen on wall that means running an additional cable.
author: texastechka

review: It's amazing what you can do with this device.
author: Miguel

review: The interface is user-friendly, even for low-tech people.

review: I love the fire stick! Very easy to use and a lot of options to choose from!

review: I am enjoying my fire TV stick
